author: Wilfred Sands
description: A light rum sour sipped through a float of pungent pot still rum.
name: Rum Dum Sour
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
